text.autoconfig.linearlevels.title: Linear Levels Configuration
text.autoconfig.linearlevels.option.curv:
Increases experience required per level using the following formula: 
Base Experience + ( Current Level * Curve Multiplier ).
text.autoconfig.linearlevels.option.base: The base amount of experience required for each level.
text.autoconfig.linearlevels.option.curv: The multiplier used in the Curve Mode calculation.
